name: Phpbb-3.0-accept-terms
tagline: A user have to accept the terms if they was changed to use his account
body: phpBB 3.0 Accept terms ====================== This is an modification for the phpBB forums software. You need an instalation of phpBB 3.0.x to use this. DESCRIPTION ------- Shows a list with similar topics at the end of a topic. INSTALATION ---------- To install this modification you need to edit some files of your phpBB installation with a text editor. Open the install.xml with your webbrowser and follow the instructions. SUPPORT ------- You can get support for this extension on phpbb.com or in german on phpbb.de. For more informations look at my Website. LICENSE ------- GNU General Public License v2
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
